resources.string:
The conference will focus on (but is not limited to) the following key topics: \n
AIE-based molecules in chemical sensing \n
AIEgens in bioimaging, theranostic and biomedical applications \n
Use of AIEgens as biosensor \n
AIE mechanism its theoretical insights \n
AIE-based polymers, oligomers, and their applications \n
AIEgens in optoelectronics and energy applications \n
Use of AIEgens in pharmaceuticals, agrochemicals and food chemistry \n
Molecules with Aggregation induced enhanced emission (AIEE) properties and their applications \n
The allied areas like small-molecule chemosensors/chemodosimeters, material-based fluorimetric sensors, supramolecular sensing, bioimaging etc. will also be within the scope of the conference.
